orders

Class Order

  • java.lang.Object
    • orders.Order
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Customizable

    public class Order
extends java.lang.Object
implements Customizable
    The Order class holds all the order information, ranging from donuts to coffee, and orders them based on when the order was made. Holds all the information of the coffee or donut order and can add or remove orders.
    Author:
    Jah C. Speed, Abe Vitangcol

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

      Constructs the order given a completed coffee or donut order and numbers it.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Prints the order into a readable string format. Used for placing the order onto the user interface. Prints it in "Order Number (ORDER NUMBER) - (ORDER TYPE AND CONTENTS)"
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The order in string format.
